data.name: Minigame Madness Demo
data.short_description: Minigame Madness is a frantic multiplayer party game for up to 16 players online. Compete with friends or strangers in a massive, ever-growing collection of fun and unique free-for-all minigames to earn awesome outfits and shiny badges!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Portuguese, Swedish, Traditional Chinese, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4Ghz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750, AMD Radeon RX 550
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This is subject to change, Minigame Madness is still in development.
